name: Harry WALLICK, Clerk of the Court of Common Pleas, Northumberland County, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Harry WALLICK, Clerk of the Court of Common Pleas, Northumberland County, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Roger V. Wiest, Charles H. Saylor, Sunbury, for appellant.
Vincent J. Dopko, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
473 A.2d 1015
Harry WALLICK, Clerk of the Court of Common Pleas, Northumberland County, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 11, 1984.
Decided April 16, 1984.
Roger V. Wiest, Charles H. Saylor, Sunbury, for appellant.
Vincent J. Dopko, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
